verses.content: Ngai ta, unauhai inngei diel diela um khâwm hi, A va ṭhain, a vân hawi de!
Luha hriek hlutak, Khâkhmula luong thla, Aron khâkhmul ngeia luong thla a, A zakawfuol hmawra luong thla ang kha a nih.
Hermon daidaw Zion tlânghaia tla hlak ang hi a nih; Chutaka chun LALPA chun malsâwmna thu a pêk a, Kumkhuoa hringna dingin.
